description:
Write a program to find the articulation points (cut vertices) in an undirected graph.

Input:

The number of nodes (N).
The number of edges (E).
E pairs of integers representing edges.
Output: List of articulation points in the graph.
Constraints:

1 <= N <= 10^5 (number of nodes)

0 <= E <= 10^6 (number of edges)

0 <= u, v < N (node indices)
title: Find  Articulation Points
